summary.span: Windows Forms 컨트롤과 WPF 컨트롤의 상호 운용을 지원하는 클래스를 포함합니다.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 네임 스페이스 간의 상호 운용성을 사용 하도록 설정 하는 클래스가 포함 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 기술 합니다.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 사용 하는 경우 클래스를 호스트할 수 있습니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 컨트롤 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 페이지와 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 요소에서 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-기반 응용 프로그램입니다.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 상호 운용성 기능을 구현 하는 두 가지 주요 클래스는 고 입니다.The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 어떤 클래스를 사용할지 제어 구현에 따라 달라 집니다.Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 사용 하 여는 클래스를 사용 해야 하는 경우는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 대 한 control 권한를 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 페이지입니다.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 사용 하 여는 클래스를 사용 해야 하는 경우는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 요소에는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-기반 응용 프로그램.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
